CONSENT TO DISCLOSE YOUR PERSONAL HEALTH INFORMATION

By submitting your information through this website, you are consenting to the disclosure of personal health information to Timiskaming Health Unit. Timiskaming Health Unit will use the information for providing to public health programs and for statistical purposes. Timiskaming Health Unit may disclose the information to health care providers for the purpose of providing care to you or your dependent, and otherwise as required or permitted by law.

If you decide to withdraw your consent at a later date or if you have any questions about this privacy notice you can contact:

Privacy and Security Officer
43-247 Whitewood Avenue
New Liskeard, ON
PO Box 1090
P0J1P0
1-705-647-4305 or 1-866-747-4305

ACCESS AND USE

You may access and use this website solely for the purposes of submitting and/or retrieving your own immunization records, or for submitting and retrieving immunization records of a dependent. You warrant that the information or material that you submit to and/or retrieve from the website through your access to, or use of, the website does not infringe the rights of any person or entity.

SECURITY

You are responsible for the security of the device, browser, and network that you are using to access this website. You will use reasonable care to safeguard your Ontario Immunization ID and PIN to access the website. You will not reveal your Ontario Immunization ID or your PIN to anyone.

I acknowledge that I have read, understood, accept and will comply with the information presented above and the Terms of Use
